Package nl.weeaboo.vn.input

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBaseInput<K>  
    IInput
    User input (keyboard, mouse/touch, gamepad).
    IInputHandler
    Receives input events.
    INativeInput
    Provides access to platform-specific input events.
  • Class Summary

    Key combination of zero or more KeyCode.

    Platform-specific input.
